plot: Discarded industrial artifacts come alive in a warehouse in Cuba, turning a place of inertia and putrefaction into the site of a disquieting but liberating gesture.
title: La Segunda Muerte Del Hombre úTil
plot_es: Discarded industrial artifacts come alive in a warehouse in Cuba, turning a place of inertia and putrefaction into the site of a disquieting but liberating gesture.
original_name: La Segunda Muerte Del Hombre úTil
plot_en: Discarded industrial artifacts come alive in a warehouse in Cuba, turning a place of inertia and putrefaction into the site of a disquieting but liberating gesture.
